physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#360 Flag Day: June 14, 1913 - Leadville, Colo. George Kelly, Driver; J.H. Kelly, W.P.; M.J. Kilkenny W.V.P.; Maurice Miller P.M.P. - Left Rear Seat.'' On envelope: ''#360 Flag Day, Leadville, 1913.''

mods.abstract: A decorated automobile driving on a street in Leadville, Colorado. The car is decorated for Flag Day and there are four men riding in the automobile. George Kelly is the Driver and Maurice Miller is in the left rear seat. The other two men are M.H. Kelly and M.J. Kilkenny.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
